page.title: 11YEARLY EVENTS
page.content: Every year we have a Gala with a fancy dress parade through the village.The parade is led by a marching band.The Gala is held to raise funds for charity.This year the money went to the Ethiopian Famine appeal. Christmas is a special time for the school children especially. The school is decorated with all the Christmas handwork. The children are very busy preparing the concert for their parents and friends. At Easter, some of the old customs are still observed like painting and rolling eggs. An ancient horse fair,held at Stow Green, was continued into the 1940's but died out with the decline of horse transport. Billingborough and Horbling have a Feast Day although the reason for it is now forgotten.
